facade

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    the customer facade is more complicated methods that use the methods from the dao.db layer in a way that separate the access to the database from the client .

      boolean logIn(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password)
      in this log in method we save the customer (that logged in )id so he or she can use all the other methods of the facade without retype the id every time .
      void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      a customer can purchase coupon after the checking that the customer didn't bought this coupon all-ready and if there coupons left and that the date isn't expired; the method will decrease the amount of coupon from the company balance after the customer purchase one
